title: The Game
creator_contributor_role: Walt Disney Educational Materials, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Choice (Psychology)
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child psychology
description: An animated film made for children, which poses the questions - how come some kids never play by the rules? Why do they always wan special treatment? Should the rules be changed? Various alternatives are offered for each problem but the real answers will be those which arise from group discussions.
